body:
Here is your problem.

Scanner keyboard = new Scanner(System.in); double radius; double area = Math.PI * radius * radius; double circum = 2 * radius * Math.PI;

You have not initialized the radius value but at the same time you're using it in calculating area and circumference. Get the input from user first. Do this first radius = keyboard.nextInt();.

You can do the calculation after you have got the radius value from the user.

Hope that helps
title: How do I initialize radius in this instance?
